arts.ttl: St. Pauli ready to take on city rivals Hamburg after drawing Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: An emotional 3-3 draw with Borussia Dortmund behind them, FC St. Pauli are now ready to face city rivals Hamburger SV in the first edition of the Hamburg derby next Friday night.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli 3-3 Borussia Dortmund: Three things we learnt
arts.sum: Relegation candidates against title challengers is how Bundesliga World Feed commentator James Thorogood billed St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund. In the first Bundesliga Topspiel, the duo locked horns in what…

arts.ttl: St. Pauli snatch Borussia Dortmund draw in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: St. Pauli and Borussia Dortmund played out a captivating, end-to-end encounter on the Bundesliga's opening weekend as Eric Smith's stunning late equaliser earned the hosts a 3-3 draw against the Black-and-Yellows. Julian Brandt (r.) celebrates with Guirassy (l.) after scoring a stunning volley to give Dortmund what seemed to be an unassailable 3-1 lead.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund: Predicted Lineups and confirmed team news
arts.sum: St. Pauli host Borussia Dortmund at the Millerntor Stadion in the Bundesliga’s first Topspiel on Saturday evening. Alexander Blessin’s side boasted the second best defence in the league last season…

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: St. Pauli and Borussia Dortmund face off in an eagerly awaited Bundesliga opener on Saturday at the Millerntor-Stadion, Hamburg. Both clubs enter this fixture with distinctive narratives as the new season kicks off in excitement and anticipation. St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund – Match Preview and Team News Date: Saturday, 23rd August. arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs St. Pauli – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund head into their Bundesliga season opener against St. Pauli on Saturday with a squad hampered by several key injuries. The clash takes place at St. Pauli’s Millerntor-Stadion in Hamburg. After finishing fourth in last season’s Bundesliga, Dortmund will be eager to start their campaign strongly under the watchful eye of coach Niko Kovač. arts.ttl: Preview | St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund – Bellingham and Co. face difficult opening day test
arts.sum: Bayern Munich have already set the benchmark in the Bundesliga with an emphatic win against RB Leipzig in the Bundesliga curtain-raiser on Friday night, and now it’s Borussia Dortmund’s turn…
